g++  -g -Wall -Wextra -Wno-unused-parameter -Wold-style-cast -Woverloaded-virtual -Wpointer-arith -Wshadow -Wwrite-strings -march=native -rdynamic  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/hello.dir/src/hello.cc.o  -o bin/hello /root/cpp/Common/muduo/build/release-install-cpp11/lib/libmuduo_net.a /root/cpp/Common/muduo/build/release-install-cpp11/lib/libmuduo_base.a lib/libBase.a -lpthread -lrt -lmysqlpp -lredis++ -lhiredis -luuid /root/cpp/Common/muduo/build/release-install-cpp11/lib/libmuduo_net.a /root/cpp/Common/muduo/build/release-install-cpp11/lib/libmuduo_base.a -lpthread -lrt
